page.title: 15 CHANGES IN THE BLOCK.
page.content: The main change in the block has been the construction of the new M.20 motorway as part of the London to Dover link.Most people agree that this has been beneficial. In Lympne there is a new housing estate which is still expanding and also a new village hall. Most people in Saltwood think that there has been little change in the village,apart from individual house building,in the last ten years. The main social change in the block,excluding Saltwood,has been the change from being a rural "living-of-the-land" community to that of a residential/dormitory area for the surrounding towns. Out of 75 people asked,only 3 worked in the block.
